dialogue.User: I want to receive an email notification whenever the trigger is activated.

dialogue.System: So you want me to send you an email when the trigger activates. What subject and body would you like for this email?
dialogue.User:
The subject should be 'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries' and the body should be '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'.

Belief State.action_fields: Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML)

Sincerely,

'

dialogue.System: Considering a new open recall from the Department of Agriculture, what query would you like me to use to identify relevant recalls?
dialogue.User: I want you to search for 'Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination'.

dialogue.User: I would like you to play music.

dialogue.System: Great! Which Android device would you like me to play music on?
dialogue.User: I would like you to play music on my Android device.

dialogue.System: Okay, and what specifically would you like me to do with your Android device?
dialogue.User: I don't need any specific action right now.

dialogue.System: So, when your Cookit starts, do you want me to trigger an action? If so, what kind of action would you like to perform?
dialogue.User: Yes, please. I want to associate this event with my Kitchen device and select 'kitchen' as the ID.
I want to receive tomorrow’s weather report via email.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that I know you want an email sent based on the weather report, what email address should I send it to?
dialogue.User: Please send the email to myaddress@example.com.

dialogue.System: Okay, I have the recipient and subject for your email. Do you want me to include anyone in the 'Cc' or 'Bcc' fields, and would you like to add an attachment?
dialogue.User:
No need for Cc or Bcc. The attachment URL is https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf, as we discussed before. And please use the HTML body:

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

.

dialogue.User: Yes, please trigger it at 08:00, specifically for the location 34.0522° N, 118.2437° W.

dialogue.User: I would like you to add any new item.

dialogue.System: Ok, so you want me to monitor Pocket for any new item. Is that correct?
dialogue.User: Yes, I would like to receive a notification when there is any new item on my Pocket account.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we've set up monitoring your Pocket account for new items, do you want me to specify any particular tag or search criteria within Pocket to narrow down what triggers a notification?
dialogue.User: No, I would like to be notified of every new item added to my Pocket account.

dialogue.System: Okay, so every time a new item is added to your Pocket account, what image would you like me to include with the tweet?
dialogue.User: I would like you to post a tweet with image every time a new item is added to my Pocket account.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that you've specified posting a tweet with image, what text would you like me to include in the tweet?
dialogue.User: I would like to post on Twitter with this text.

dialogue.System: Perfect! So you want me to post this tweet with the provided text and image on Twitter?
dialogue.User: Yes, please share the tweet with the text 'Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]' and the image from 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D'.
